history.proof: intros a H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z H : Zodd a Unable to unify "?M1839 = 2 * Z.quot2 ?M1839 - 1" with "exists k : Z, - a = 2 * k + 1".

In environment H0 : forall n : Z, n <= 0 -> Zodd n -> n = match Z.quot2 n with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos y'~0 | Z.neg y' => Z.neg y'~0 end - 1 a : Z H : Zodd a Unable to unify "0 <= 1" with "exists k : Z, - a = match k with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos y'~0 | Z.neg y' => Z.neg y'~0 end + 1".

In environment H1 : forall n : Z, n <= 0 -> Zodd n -> n = match Z.quot2 n with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos y'~0 | Z.neg y' => Z.neg y'~0 end - 1 a : Z H : Zodd a Unable to unify "Zodd a" with "exists k : Z, - a = match k with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos y'~0 | Z.neg y' => Z.neg y'~0 end + 1".

original: intros a H. apply Zodd_def2. apply Zodd_quot2_neg. - apply Z.le_0_1. - apply H.
